Articles.Content:
I've been playing around with the kethane mod lately and decided to make a refueling station to orbit around Minmus, along with a large kethane rig to make trips to and from the surface. I plan to use the station to fuel future inter-planetary missions as well. So far, I have a total of 4 different types of modules at Minmus, and a total of 7 modules, all of which are probes. (I have yet to send kerbals to either of the stations...)

- Overview of the operation: http://prntscr.com/2fo1kr

- Kethane Detecting Probe: http://prntscr.com/2fo267

- Fuel Depository: http://prntscr.com/2fo2ol

- Kethane Rig: http://prntscr.com/2fo34z

- Habitation Station: http://prntscr.com/2fo3gr

I'm planning to make a base, along with a shuttle to ferry kerbals to and from the surface of Minmus. Kethane trucks/rovers are also something I might add..
